desc.en: JR East, also known as East Japan Railway Company, is one of the six passenger railway companies established on April 1, 1987 after the privatization of Japanese National Railways, serving the eastern part of Honshu Island, Japan's main island, operating 69 lines with a total mileage of 7,457.3 kilometers, making it the largest passenger railway operator in Japan.
desc.zh-Hans: JR东日本，也被称为东日本铁路公司，是在日本国营铁路私有化后于1987年4月1日成立的六家客运铁路公司之一，服务于日本主岛本州岛的东部地区，运营有69条线路，总里程达7457.3公里，是日本最大的客运铁路事业者。
